required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational, Long-term, Extension Study for Participants of Prior VY-AADC01 or VY-AADC02 Studies
clinical_study.official_title: An Observational, Long-Term Extension Study for Participants of Prior VY-AADC01 or VY-AADC02 Clinical Studies

brief_summary.textblock: An extension study for participants who have completed VY-AADC01 or VY-AADC02 Studies

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (Safety and Tolerability)
primary_outcome.description: Long-term safety of VY-AADC as assessed by Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events

secondary_outcome.description: Continued expression of AADC as measured by [18F]-fluorodopa (F-Dopa) positron emission tomography (PET)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Participants from VY-AADC01 or VY-AADC02 clinical studies
arm_group.description: Participants who have finished participating in Voyager-sponsored VY-AADC01 or VY-AADC02 clinical studies will be invited to participate in this extension study

study_pop.textblock: Participants from prior VY-AADC01 or VY-AADC02 clinical studies will be eligible for the extension study

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Participant in Voyager-sponsored clinical study of VY-AADC01 or VY-AADC02 gene therapy
2. Ability to comprehend and signed the informed consent, or for participants who are not capable of providing consent, have a healthcare proxy, or person with power of attorney, who is able and willing to give consent on behalf of the participant
3. Capable of complying with the protocol
Exclusion Criteria:
None
